raw_body: NALLIAH – MRS. JESSIE. Beloved wife of late Kunam Nalliah, loved mother of Christine, Daniel, late Kumar and late Christopher (Kitto), mother-in-law of Percy Jayatheepam and Maryse Nalliah, loving grandmother of Prashan and Ruvini, Keshan and Surandini, Sushan and Priveeniya, Nigel and Samantha, Shannen and Samuel and Brianna, adored great-grandmother of Johanan, Ava, Micah, Joshua, Naren and Danick, went to be with the Lord on Monday the 22nd of
